SEARCH
Module com.champlain.oop2assignment2
Package com.champlain.oop2assignment2

Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.champlain.oop2assignment2.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Card>
public class Card extends Object implements Comparable<Card>
Represents a playing card with a specific rank and suit.

Implements the Comparable interface to compare cards based on their suit and rank.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Card o)
      Compares this card with another card for order. The comparison is first based on suit, and if the suits are equal, then on rank.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Card>
      Parameters:
      o - The card to be compared.
      Returns:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this card is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified card.
